abstract: Willie Sutton robbed banks because “that’s where the money is.” Steve Ballmer says Microsoft continues to pursue Web search for the same reason.
snippet: Willie Sutton robbed banks because “that’s where the money is.” Steve Ballmer says Microsoft continues to pursue Web search for the same reason.
lead_paragraph: If you are making something that is growing and profitable, why throw billions at something else that has kept losing money and market share?

headline.main: Why Microsoft Continues to Chase Internet Search
